laazotea.indi.server

Class INDIJavaDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.server.INDIDeviceListener
      • laazotea.indi.server.INDIDevice
        • laazotea.indi.server.INDIJavaDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    laazotea.indi.INDIProtocolParser

    public class INDIJavaDevice
extends INDIDevice
    A class that represent a Java Device (created with the INDI Driver library).
    Version:
    1.32, July 23, 2013
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]
    See Also:
    laazotea.indi.driver

    • Constructor Detail

      • INDIJavaDevice

        protected INDIJavaDevice(AbstractINDIServer server,
              java.lang.Class driverClass,
              java.lang.String identifier)
                  throws laazotea.indi.INDIException
        Constructs a new Java Device and starts listening to its messages.
        Parameters:
        server - The server which listens to this Device.
        driverClass - The class of the Driver.
        identifier - The JAR file from where to load the Driver.
        Throws:
        laazotea.indi.INDIException - if there is any problem instantiating the Driver.
